name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, Weibo has begun to block the content of this letter. Some pictures sent by netizens cannot be displayed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 20, Zhang Qingfang, a well-known criminal defense lawyer and a doctor of criminal law at Peking University, had his lawyer license revoked.
Lawyer Zhang Qingfang responded: "I gladly accept this historical honor."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 20, Guangchang No. 1 Middle School in Fuzhou City, Jiangxi Province, forced all students to fill out an application form, voluntarily and "begging" the school to resume evening self-study and Saturday and Sunday after-school care services. Students who were unwilling to fill out the form would be threatened with suspension of classes by calling their parents. Some students reported the matter to the Education Bureau, and the reporting students were subsequently dealt with by the school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Headlines of major official newspapers on September 21.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Beijing issued the "Notice on the Issuance of Reward Fees (5 Yuan) for Parents of Only Children in 2024". Couples who hold an Only Child Honor Certificate and whose only child is under the age of 18 will each receive a reward of 5 yuan per month.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 21, Kuaishou announced that it would take action against related illegal activities such as spreading content that incited confrontation between China and Japan, and a total of more than 90 illegal accounts were dealt with.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 21, Puning School Affiliated to South China Normal University held a symposium for parent representatives. The big screen at the meeting displayed "Anyone who dares to speak ill of the school will be attacked by the whole group. Internal problems should be solved internally, and no one else is allowed to make irresponsible remarks." "Read the content of the school's official account with your children and talk about the school's outstanding achievements."
